Message.En:
The invasion of the Crucible of Demons is
entering a more difficult phase.
While defeating the waves of enemies, the goal is
to eliminate more of the dragonkin!
The target, of course, is the Elder Dragon, the
great dragon of fire and brimstone!
Message.Jp:
《魔物のるつぼ》への侵攻作戦は
より困難な局面に入りつつある
時番を仕留めながら、より多くの竜族を討伐するのだ！
狙うはもちろん、爆炎の大竜エルダードラゴン！

Message.En:
Defeat Dragonkin and aim to acquire more than
8000pt.
Message.Jp: 竜族を討伐し、8000pt以上獲得を目指せ

Message.En:
Find and defeat "Time Bonus" enemies for a time
bonus
Message.Jp: 《時番》を探し出し、討伐でタイムボーナス

Message.En: The Crucible of Demons: Blaze (Result Reward)
Message.Jp: 魔物のるつぼ ：火炎《リザルト報酬》

Message.En:
The forces of the Dragonkin are growing stronger!
Those who have confidence in their skills, gather
at Cave Harbor right now.
Let's join forces and take down the mighty dragon
of blazing flames!
Message.Jp:
竜族の勢力が勢いを増している！
腕に自信がある奴は、今すぐ港洞に集まってくれ
皆で力を合わせて爆炎の大竜を仕留めるぞ！
